data.eml:eml: Redescription of Echinoderes levanderi Karling, 1954 (Kinorhyncha: Cyclorhagida) - a kinorhynch tolerant to very low salinities

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sørensen, Martin V. (2018): Redescription of Echinoderes levanderi Karling, 1954 (Kinorhyncha: Cyclorhagida) - a kinorhynch tolerant to very low salinities. European Journal of Taxonomy 436: 1-17, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.436
